remarks.para: Except for ER operations beyond 120 minutes, one may be inoperative closed provided aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: If ignition system is inoperative the engine anti-ice valve must be operative.

Operations in known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard appropriate Engine Anti-ice Switch "COWL VALVE INOP CLOSED" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

warning.para: TAG THRUST REVERSER LEVERS - "DO NOT OPERATE."

numlitem.para: Access engine inlet thermal anti-ice valve by opening the access panel on the appropriate engine.
For left engine, open access panel 414AR.
For right engine, open access panel 424AR.
Disconnect, cap and stow TAI valve connector.
Check that vane manual drive indicates valve "CLOSED".
Pull vane lock out and rotate 90° clockwise to "LOCK CLOSED" position.
Check appropriate ANTI-ICE ENGINE L or R switchlight, on wing and engine anti-ice control panel (P5), is OFF.
Disregard associated VALVE light and EICAS message indications, if any.
